quotes: By 2023, the foundation had funded a total of $77.6 billion in grants.
she stepped down from her role as co-chair of the foundation in May 2024.
In 2015, French Gates launched Pivotal Ventures, an investment firm aimed at funding organizations that support social progress.
In October 2024, she announced $250 million of her pledge will go to the Action for Women’s Health fund, which she launched through Pivotal Ventures.
As of March 13, 2025, French Gates has an estimated net worth of $30.1 billion, according to Forbes’ real-time tracker.

she told Time in June 2024. “To have a law on the books since I was 9 years old, and to have it rolled back, and all the downstream consequences—like these women’s-health deserts now when we already have one of the highest maternal-mortality rates of high-income countries—I can’t not speak up about that,”
